content.question: If <math alttext="f of x, equals, arctangent x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mi>arctan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the limit as x approaches the square root of 3, of, the fraction with numerator f of x, minus f of, open parenthesis, the square root of 3, close parenthesis, and denominator x minus the square root of 3, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>−</mo><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is
